project.name: Cesium

target.name: build
target.description: A developer build that runs in-place.

target.name: combine
target.description: Combines all source files into a single stand-alone script.

target.name: minify
target.description: Combines all source files into a single stand-alone, minified script.

target.name: release
target.description: A full release build that creates a shippable product, including documentation.

target.name: instrumentForCoverage
target.description: A debug build instrumented for JSCoverage (currently Windows only).

target.name: makeZipFile
target.description: Builds a zip file containing all release files.

arg.line: ${rjsPath} -o optimize=${optimize} wrap=true baseUrl=. name=${relativeAlmondPath} include=main out=${relativeCesiumFilePath}
